**Soul Splinter** is a level 1 [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") spell that targets an enemy in range and attempts to break off a fragment of its soul to create a [soul wisp](/Soul_wisp "Soul wisp"). [Necromancers](/Necromancer "Necromancer") begin with this spell memorised.

## Useful Info

If the spell passes a [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") check, and the target can be [spectralised](/Spectral_thing "Spectral thing"), a [soul wisp](/Soul_wisp "Soul wisp") will be created adjacent to the target with 7-11 HP and HD equal to `target's HD + 1`. Soul wisp's melee damage is `2 + HD`. The soul wisp will fixate on the target, similar to [Haunt](/Haunt "Haunt").

The target is also [weakened](/Weak "Weak") for about 18 turns.

## Strategy

## History

Added in [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), replacing [Necrotise](/Necrotise "Necrotise").

Attempts to force a tiny fragment of a living, holy, or demonic being's soul to take leave of their body and manifest as a soul wisp. This wisp is nominally under the necromancer's control, but will focus its attacks foremost on the creature it was created from, instinctually trying to return to its proper home once more. The victim will be weakened until the wisp reverts to where it belongs.

Wisps created from more powerful souls have more damaging attacks, but are always fragile.

The target is also weakened for about 18 turns.
